00029 template<class T> class ckBuf
00030 {
00031 public:
00033     ckDefineException(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00034     ckDefineException(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00035     ckDefineException(ExceptionOutOfBuffer);
00037 
00041     ckBuf()
00042     {
00043         m_elem = NULL;
00044         m_state = NULL;
00045         m_index_tbl = NULL;
00046         m_size = m_used_size = 0;
00047     }
00048 
00052     ~ckBuf()
00053     {
00054         if (m_elem)
00055         {
00056             for (s32 i = 0; i < m_size; i++)
00057             {
00058                 if (m_state[i] == STATE_USED)
00059                 {
00060                     m_elem[i].~T();
00061                 }
00062             }
00063 
00064             ckFree(m_elem);
00065             ckDeleteArray(m_state, u8);
00066             ckDeleteArray(m_index_tbl, u16);
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00074     void init(u16 size)
00075     {
00076         if (size == 0)
00077         {
00078             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00079         }
00080 
00081         this->~ckBuf();
00082 
00083         m_size = size;
00084         m_used_size = 0;
00085 
00086         m_elem = static_cast<T*>(ckMalloc(sizeof(T) * m_size));
00087         ckNewArray(m_state, u8, m_size);
00088         ckNewArray(m_index_tbl, u16, m_size);
00089 
00090         for (s32 i = 0; i < m_size; i++)
00091         {
00092             m_state[i] = STATE_FREE;
00093             m_index_tbl[i] = i;
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00101     u16 getSize() const
00102     {
00103         return m_size;
00104     }
00105 
00110     u16 getUsedSize() const
00111     {
00112         return m_used_size;
00113     }
00114 
00119     u16 getFreeSize() const
00120     {
00121         return m_size - m_used_size;
00122     }
00123 
00129     T* getFirstN() const
00130     {
00131         if (!m_elem)
00132         {
00133             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00134         }
00135 
00136         for (s32 i = 0; i < m_size; i++)
00137         {
00138             if (m_state[i] == STATE_USED)
00139             {
00140                 return &m_elem[i];
00141             }
00142         }
00143 
00144         return NULL;
00145     }
00146 
00152     T* getLastN() const
00153     {
00154         if (!m_elem)
00155         {
00156             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00157         }
00158 
00159         for (s32 i = m_size - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00160         {
00161             if (m_state[i] == STATE_USED)
00162             {
00163                 return &m_elem[i];
00164             }
00165         }
00166 
00167         return NULL;
00168     }
00169 
00176     T* getPrevN(const T* elem) const
00177     {
00178         if (!m_elem)
00179         {
00180             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00181         }
00182 
00183         if (elem < m_elem || elem >= m_elem + m_size)
00184         {
00185             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00186         }
00187 
00188         u16 index = static_cast<u16>(elem - m_elem);
00189 
00190         if (m_state[index] == STATE_FREE)
00191         {
00192             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00193         }
00194 
00195         if (index > 0)
00196         {
00197             for (s32 i = index - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00198             {
00199                 if (m_state[i] == STATE_USED)
00200                 {
00201                     return &m_elem[i];
00202                 }
00203             }
00204         }
00205 
00206         return NULL;
00207     }
00208 
00215     T* getNextN(const T* elem) const
00216     {
00217         if (!m_elem)
00218         {
00219             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00220         }
00221 
00222         if (elem < m_elem || elem >= m_elem + m_size)
00223         {
00224             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00225         }
00226 
00227         u16 index = static_cast<u16>(elem - m_elem);
00228 
00229         if (m_state[index] == STATE_FREE)
00230         {
00231             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00232         }
00233 
00234         if (index + 1 < m_size)
00235         {
00236             for (s32 i = index + 1; i < m_size; i++)
00237             {
00238                 if (m_state[i] == STATE_USED)
00239                 {
00240                     return &m_elem[i];
00241                 }
00242             }
00243         }
00244 
00245         return NULL;
00246     }
00247 
00252     T* newElement()
00253     {
00254         if (!m_elem)
00255         {
00256             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00257         }
00258 
00259         if (m_used_size >= m_size)
00260         {
00261             ckThrow(ExceptionOutOfBuffer);
00262         }
00263 
00264         u16 index = m_index_tbl[m_used_size];
00265 
00266         m_state[index] = STATE_USED;
00267 
00268         m_used_size++;
00269 
00270         T* elem = &m_elem[index];
00271         new(elem, NULL) T;
00272 
00273         return elem;
00274     }
00275 
00280     void deleteElement(T* elem)
00281     {
00282         if (!m_elem)
00283         {
00284             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00285         }
00286 
00287         if (elem < m_elem || elem >= m_elem + m_size)
00288         {
00289             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00290         }
00291 
00292         u16 index = static_cast<u16>(elem - m_elem);
00293 
00294         if (m_state[index] == STATE_FREE)
00295         {
00296             ckThrow(ExceptionInvalidArgument);
00297         }
00298 
00299         elem->~T();
00300 
00301         m_used_size--;
00302 
00303         m_index_tbl[m_used_size] = index;
00304         m_state[index] = STATE_FREE;
00305     }
00306 
00310     void clear()
00311     {
00312         if (!m_elem)
00313         {
00314             ckThrow(ExceptionNotInitialized);
00315         }
00316 
00317         m_used_size = 0;
00318 
00319         for (s32 i = 0; i < m_size; i++)
00320         {
00321             if (m_state[i] == STATE_USED)
00322             {
00323                 m_elem[i].~T();
00324                 m_state[i] = STATE_FREE;
00325             }
00326 
00327             m_index_tbl[i] = i;
00328         }
00329     }
00330 
00331 private:
00332     enum ElemState
00333     {
00334         STATE_FREE, //
00335         STATE_USED
00336     };
00337 
00338     ckBuf(const ckBuf<T>&) {}
00339     void operator=(const ckBuf<T>&) {}
00340 
00341     T* m_elem;
00342     u8* m_state;
00343     u16* m_index_tbl;
00344     u16 m_size;
00345     u16 m_used_size;
00346 };
